events.description: Live action begins with Bayern Munich player #10 (Arjen Robben) receiving the ball and dribbling into the attacking third, moving towards the right side of the field while being pressured by multiple Manchester United defenders.

Bayern Munich player #10 (Arjen Robben) executes a precise short pass to teammate #13 (Rafinha) who is positioned on the right wing, just outside the penalty area, initiating a dangerous attacking play.

Bayern Munich player #13 (Rafinha) attempts to deliver a low cross from the right side of the penalty box into the center, but the ball is intercepted and blocked by Manchester United defender #4, deflecting into the crowded penalty area.

GOAL! Bayern Munich player #31 (Bastian Schweinsteiger) powerfully strikes the deflected ball with his right foot from inside the penalty box, sending a clinical shot past the diving Manchester United goalkeeper into the top left corner of the net.
Bayern Munich goal scorer Bastian Schweinsteiger (#31) celebrates emphatically by pumping his fists and embracing teammate Rafinha (#13) near the sideline, showing strong emotion after scoring.
The Bayern Munich crowd erupts in jubilant celebration, with fans in the stands waving their arms, cheering loudly, and displaying collective excitement following their team's goal.

Bayern Munich players, including Bastian Schweinsteiger (#31), Arjen Robben (#10), and Rafinha (#13), gather in a close huddle on the field, embracing each other in a passionate team celebration of the goal.
Bayern Munich coach Pep Guardiola and an assistant coach are observed intently from the sideline, with the assistant covering his mouth in an anxious gesture, indicating a tense moment in the match.
Bayern Munich players, including Bastian Schweinsteiger (#31), David Alaba (#27), and Mario Mandžukić (#9), are seen on the field reacting to a play, with Alaba raising his hand towards the crowd.

Franck Ribéry (#7) of Bayern Munich receives the ball on the left side of the penalty area, dribbles past a defender, and unleashes a precise low, left-footed shot towards the bottom right corner of the goal, beating the diving Manchester United goalkeeper and scoring a goal.

A replay from an elevated angle shows Franck Ribéry (#7) executing his left-footed shot from inside the box, with the ball cleanly striking the back of the net past the outstretched arms of the Manchester United goalkeeper.

A close-up replay confirms Franck Ribéry's (#7) goal, showcasing the power and accuracy of his left-footed strike into the bottom corner. On-screen text appears, stating 'Neue Spielstand. Tor von FC Bayern.' (New score. Goal by FC Bayern.)

A replay from behind the goal provides a clear view of the ball in the net after Franck Ribéry's (#7) goal. Manchester United player Marouane Fellaini (#31) is seen looking dejected near the goal line.

Player #31, positioned extremely close to the goal, attempts a powerful header or a close-range shot, directing the ball towards the upper left corner of the net. Goalkeeper #1 makes a full-stretch diving effort to his right, but the ball crucially strikes the crossbar and deflects out of play, narrowly missing a goal. Player #7 is also present inside the penalty box.

A slow-motion replay from a different angle confirms Player #31's header or shot attempt, showing the ball's trajectory as it impacts the crossbar with significant force before deflecting away. The replay clearly illustrates the Goalkeeper #1's desperate diving save attempt.
